topics.body:
Since finals are over for me, I got back to watching my cartoons.

[spoiler]99% sure that "Tanks for the Memories" was supposed be about Tanks' death but Hasbro wouldn't allow it. Almost all of the dialogue points to that conclusion.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
I am reading a (translated) Japanese light novel.
Man, the hero is a jerk. I get it that you were abused by fucking everyone when you got here but come on, changing the princess's (who accused him of rape to steal his stuff) name to "Bitch"?
That's just low.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
God dammit, my dad just cheered at the TV while watching a football match.
It keeps happening~!
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:

My grandfather (who is like a father to me cuz like my dad and mom are separated and I haven't seen him in years and I have lived with my grandparents and mom and brother and aunt almost all my life so like anyways) watches hockey a lot
